publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2292# Trish Godman: Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisorsâ€”That the Parliament commends warmly the important role performed by members of the Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors in relation to Government departments, appeals tribunals and other agencies in seeking to lessen the misery of men, women and children living in poverty and on low incomes and believes that this laudable advisory work should be acknowledged by the Scottish Executive. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Hugh Henry*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Karen Whitefield*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Watson*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2292# Scottish Local Authorities Welfare Rights Advisors (lodged on 4 October 2001) Rhoda Grant*
